domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: Dena Grayson
entity.description: an American medical doctor, researcher and politician

text: @DrDenaGrayson I heard this yesterday,it’s beyond heartbreaking. How close are we to a vaccine for these heroes on the front lines? I can’t imagine being in a position to see up close, the horrific effects of #COVID19 on human beings. This woman is a hero.
